name: RoosterMoney
0:
”Alexa, ask Rooster Money what's in Joe's spend pot?”
”How much has Joe earned this month?”
”What jobs does Joe need to do today?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rooster money
des:
How much money do I have Alexa? Now you and your kids can ask Alexa questions about their RoosterMoney account! Whether it’s seeing what’s left to spend, or what chores there are to do today, Alexa is there to support your families’ money conversations. Why not have a bit of fun and find out who spent and earned the most this year?

You can ask questions on the following topics:
- Spend balance
- Account total
- How much has been spent or earned
- What chores there are to do today
